message:
I was wondering about ITWorx .. Is it still a good company as it used to be ? Because I heard a lot concerning that. Are they working on new products (maybe mobile apps) because I also heard they're just maintaining products the created before ? what is your opinion at work environment? 
Thanks

data.message: I used to check companies reviews on Glassdoor.com and I was shocked at all these bad reviews about ITworx and another big companies in Egypt
We always consider ITworx as our role model , rabena yestor :)
Personally, I would read the Glassdoor, interview multiple people at different levels and find out which team I would be joining and gather intelligence about that specific team.

Most Egyptian companies will never exceed the services/maintenance level. If you want to build something new or innovate join a startup (instabug and crowd analyzer are excellent examples) or leave Egypt.
Actually I'm just asking because of a debate with a friend but I'm satisfied with startup I involved in and its products
